member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.GetDataFormat
member.summary: Gets a GUID that identifies the track's underlying data format.
member.param: A GUID that identifies the track's underlying data format.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.GetErrorCode
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the error type of the latest error associated with the track.
member.returns: A value indicating the error type of the latest error associated with the track.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.GetExtendedErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the extended error code for the latest error associated with the track.
member.returns: The extended error code for the latest error associated with the track.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.GetId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the track of timed text.
member.returns: Returns the identifier of the track.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.GetInBandMetadataTrackDispatchType
member.summary: Gets the in-band metadata of the track.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the in-band metadata of the track.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.GetLabel
member.summary: Gets the label of the track.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the label of the track.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.GetLanguage
member.summary: Gets the language of the track.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the language of the track.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.GetTrackKind
member.summary: Gets the kind of timed-text track.
member.returns: Returns a -typed value that specifies the kind of timed-text track.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.IsActive
member.summary: Determines whether the timed-text track is active.
member.returns: Returns whether the timed-text track is active. If TRUE, the timed-text track is active; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.IsInBand
member.summary: Determines whether the timed-text track is inband.
member.returns: Returns whether the timed-text track is inband. If TRUE, the timed-text track is inband; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack.SetLabel
member.summary: Sets the label of a timed-text track.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated wide-character string that contains the label of the track.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrack
member.summary: Represents a track of timed text.
